resources.string: You can use this email to activate your subscription from browser settings in the DuckDuckGo app on your other devices.
Add an email address to access your subscription in DuckDuckGo on other devices. Weâ€™ll only use this address to verify your subscription.
Use your subscription on other devices
Access your Privacy Pro subscription via an email address.
Privacy Pro is available on any device signed in to your Google Play Store account.
Google Play was unable to process your purchase. Please try again later.
The subscription associated with this Google Play account is no longer active.
Activate your subscription on this device
Access your Privacy Pro subscription on this device via Google Play or an email address.
Your subscription is automatically available in DuckDuckGo on any device signed in to your Google Play account.
Use your email to activate your subscription on this device.
Your subscription has been removed from this device
You will no longer be able to access your Privacy Pro subscription on this device. This will not cancel your subscription, and it will remain active on your other devices.

string.name: subscriptionsData
string.instruction: First placeholder is renews or expires, second is a date in format MMMM dd, yyyy

string.name: subscriptionsExpiredData
string.instruction: The placeholder is a date in format MMMM dd, yyyy

resources.string: More seamless privacy with three new protections, including:
This is taking longer than usual, please check back later.
Subscribe again to continue using Privacy\u00A0Pro
Your already had a subscription and we\'ve recovered that for you.
We\'re having trouble connecting. Please try again later.
Remove your info from sites that sell it
If your identity is stolen, we\'ll help restore it

Your subscription was purchased through the Apple App Store. To change your plan or billing settings, please go to Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions on a device signed in to the same Apple ID used to purchase your subscription.
Activate Privacy Pro on desktop to set up Personal Information Removal
In the DuckDuckGo browser for desktop, go to Settings > Privacy Pro and click I Have a Subscription to get started.
Can\'t open file. Check for compatible app.
